query.statement:
SELECT A.POSID AS PSPID, A.POSID_1 AS POSID, A.ZZACTSS, A.TEXT30, A.LIFNR, C.NAME1 AS LIFNR_NM, A.TEMNO, A.NAMET, A.TEMNO2, A.NAMET2, A.ZZSHIP1, A.ZZCOMP2, P.STEP3_GBN AS TYPE, A.ZZGUBUN,
(CASE WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP1' THEN B.STEP1_DT WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP2' THEN B.STEP2_DT WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP3' THEN B.STEP3_DT ELSE '' END) AS STEP_DT,
(CASE WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP1' THEN (SELECT X.FNAME_APP FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL002 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.GBN IN ('N1','O1','P1') AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.POSID = A.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP2' THEN (SELECT X.FNAME_APP FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL002 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.GBN IN ('N4','O4','P4') AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.POSID = A.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP3' THEN (SELECT X.FNAME_APP FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL002 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.GBN IN ('N5','O5','P7') AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.POSID = A.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) ELSE '' END) AS IMAGE1, (CASE WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP1' THEN (SELECT X.IMAGE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1111 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = X.GUBUN AND P.STEP3_GBN = X.TYPE AND X.SAFE = 'A' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP2' THEN (SELECT X.IMAGE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1111 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = X.GUBUN AND P.STEP3_GBN = X.TYPE AND X.SAFE = 'B' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP3' THEN (SELECT X.IMAGE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1111 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = X.GUBUN AND P.STEP3_GBN = X.TYPE AND X.SAFE = 'C' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) ELSE '' END) AS IMAGE_NM,
(CASE WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP1' THEN (SELECT X.FNAME_APP FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL002 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.GBN IN ('N2','O2','P2') AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.POSID = A.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP2' THEN (SELECT X.FNAME_APP FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL002 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.GBN IN ('N5','P5') AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.POSID = A.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP3'THEN (SELECT X.FNAME_APP FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL002 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.GBN IN ('N6','O6') AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.POSID = A.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) ELSE '' END) AS IMAGE2,
(CASE WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP1' THEN (SELECT X.IMAGE_NM2 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1111 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = X.GUBUN AND P.STEP3_GBN = X.TYPE AND X.SAFE = 'A' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP2' THEN (SELECT X.IMAGE_NM2 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1111 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = X.GUBUN AND P.STEP3_GBN = X.TYPE AND X.SAFE = 'B' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP3'THEN (SELECT X.IMAGE_NM2 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1111 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = X.GUBUN AND P.STEP3_GBN = X.TYPE AND X.SAFE = 'C' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) ELSE '' END) AS IMAGE_NM2,
(CASE WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP1' THEN (SELECT X.FNAME_APP FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL002 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.GBN IN ( 'N3','O3','P3') AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.POSID = A.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP2' THEN (SELECT X.FNAME_APP FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL002 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.GBN IN ('P6') AND X.PSPID = A.POSID AND X.POSID = A.POSID_1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
ELSE '' END) AS IMAGE3,
(CASE WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP1' THEN (SELECT X.IMAGE_NM3 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1111 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = X.GUBUN AND P.STEP3_GBN = X.TYPE AND X.SAFE = 'A' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP2' THEN (SELECT X.IMAGE_NM3 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1111 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = X.GUBUN AND P.STEP3_GBN = X.TYPE AND X.SAFE = 'B' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY)
WHEN #STEP# = 'STEP3' THEN ( SELECT X.IMAGE_NM3 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1111 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = X.GUBUN AND P.STEP3_GBN = X.TYPE AND X.SAFE = 'C' FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) ELSE '' END) AS IMAGE_NM3,
D.ZSITE_NM
,CASE WHEN B.STEP1_DT > '10000101' THEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(CHAR(TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(B.STEP1_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 1, 10), '-', '.') ELSE '' END AS STEP1_DT ,CASE WHEN B.STEP2_DT > '10000101' THEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(CHAR(TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(B.STEP2_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 1, 10), '-', '.') ELSE '' END AS STEP2_DT ,CASE WHEN B.STEP3_DT > '10000101' THEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(CHAR(TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(B.STEP3_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 1, 10), '-', '.') ELSE '' END AS STEP3_DT
,CASE WHEN B.APPR1_DT > '10000101' THEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(CHAR(TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(B.APPR1_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 1, 10), '-', '.') ELSE '' END AS APPR1_DT ,CASE WHEN B.APPR2_DT > '10000101' THEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(CHAR(TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(B.APPR2_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 1, 10), '-', '.') ELSE '' END AS APPR2_DT ,CASE WHEN B.APPR3_DT > '10000101' THEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(CHAR(TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(B.APPR3_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 1, 10), '-', '.') ELSE '' END AS APPR3_DT
, CASE WHEN (B.APPR1_DT > '10000101') AND (B.RJCT1_DESC IS NULL OR B.RJCT1_DESC = '') THEN 'Ω¬¿Œ¿œ' WHEN (B.APPR1_DT > '10000101') AND (B.RJCT1_DESC > '') THEN 'π›∑¡¿œ' ELSE 'Ω¬¿Œ¿œ' END APPR1_TXT , CASE WHEN (B.APPR2_DT > '10000101') AND (B.RJCT2_DESC IS NULL OR B.RJCT2_DESC = '') THEN 'Ω¬¿Œ¿œ' WHEN (B.APPR2_DT > '10000101') AND (B.RJCT2_DESC > '') THEN 'π›∑¡¿œ' ELSE 'Ω¬¿Œ¿œ' END APPR2_TXT , CASE WHEN (B.APPR3_DT > '10000101') AND (B.RJCT3_DESC IS NULL OR B.RJCT3_DESC = '') THEN 'Ω¬¿Œ¿œ' WHEN (B.APPR3_DT > '10000101') AND (B.RJCT3_DESC > '') THEN 'π›∑¡¿œ' ELSE 'Ω¬¿Œ¿œ' END APPR3_TXT
,B.RJCT1_DESC ,B.RJCT2_DESC ,B.RJCT3_DESC
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW1502 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.POSID = B.PSPID AND A.POSID_1 = B.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = C.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0111M AS P ON P.MANDT = A.MANDT AND P.GUBUN = A.ZZGUBUN AND P.TYPE = A.TYPE AND P.VER = A.VER INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS D ON D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND D.POSID = A.POSID
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
#GUBUN+#
#GUBUN2+#
-- -- AND A.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '13') -- -- -- AND A.ZZGUBUN IN ('11', '12', '14') -- -- AND A.TXT04 <> 'C'
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
